commitResults.messageTitle: Add echo function and customize its greet and exit functions
commitResults.messageBody:
Echo repeats commands entered by the user

Customize its greet and exit functions to make it more unique

"addCommand" stores the command entered
"listCommand" displays the commands stored

commitResults.messageTitle: Add "markTask" function and change to use a class "Task" for tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
"markTask" function marks and unmarks a task
according to command entered

Change to use a class to represent tasks because tasks now
have a new condition of "isDone"

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak the code to comply with CS2113 coding standard

commitResults.messageBody:
Use three subclasses of Task class to represent these types of tasks

"ToDo" is same as a normal task
"Deadline" is a task with a deadline
"Event" is a task with a start date and an end date

commitResults.messageTitle: Test using the I/O redirection technique
commitResults.messageBody: Use the technique to semi-automate the testing of Ava

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor the code to improve its quality
commitResults.messageBody:
Delete some redunant parts in function "markTask"

Reduce the number of parameter of function "listTask" to one
This is possible after adding "numberOfTasks" variable in class "Task"
When incorrect inputs are entered, Ava now prints out error messages
Create two packages "ava" and "task", and divide classes accordingly

commitResults.messageTitle: Use Java Collections classes for tasks
commitResults.messageBody: Change from a Task array to a collection class

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for deleting tasks from the list
commitResults.messageBody: The "deleteTask" method added is able to delete tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Add createFile method in DataFile class
commitResults.messageBody: createFile method creates a file when there is not an "ava.txt"

The class saves tasks in "data/ava.txt" and
load the file when the chatbot starts up

Ava now saves the tasks after deleting each task

Account for the situation of 0 task when saving the task

commitResults.messageTitle: Make the Storage class more OOP
commitResults.messageBody: Construct a storage object whenever Ava starts
Construct a tasks object of type TaskList whenever Ava starts
Ui deals with interactions with the user
The class deals with making sense of the user command
